import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-comment-detail', templateUrl: './comment-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./comment-detail.component.css'] }) export class CommentDetailComponent { }

Comment Id: {{ comment.commentId }}

Post Id: {{ comment.postId | uppercase }}

User Id: {{ comment.userId }}

Content

{{ comment.comment }}

Creation Date

{{ comment.creationDate }}

Confirmation State

{{ comment.isConfirmed }}
